Class Workshop

  • java.lang.Object
    • Workshop

  • public class Workshop
extends java.lang.Object
    Workshop class that stores tools in an array list

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Workshop()
      Constructs an empty workshop

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTool(Tool thing)
      addTool adds a specified Tool to the Workshop
      void emptyShop()
      empties the workshop
      Tool findTool(Tool thing)
      findTool returns a reference to the Tool from the workshop that matches the name of the parameter item
      java.util.ArrayList<Tool> getShop()
      getShop returns an arraylist of the tools in the workshop
      double getTotalPrice()
      getTotalPrice returns the total Price of all Tools in the workshop
      void loadFromFile()
      Loads a new workshop from a user specified file.
      boolean removeTool(Tool thing)
      removeTool removes a specified Tool from the workshop if it exists, and returns true.
      void saveToFile()
      Saves the current contents of the workshop to a user specified file.
      static void sortByDate(java.util.ArrayList<Tool> list)
      sortByDate sorts the workshop by the most recent use
      static void sortByUses(java.util.ArrayList<Tool> list)
      sortByUses sorts the workshop by number of uses, going from most to least
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString provides a String version of the workshop with each tool on a separate line
      boolean updatePrice(Tool thing, double a)
      updatePrice assigns a new price for the tool
      boolean updateUses(Tool thing, int add)
      updateUses increments the number of uses of a tool

        getShop returns an arraylist of the tools in the workshop

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        toString provides a String version of the workshop with each tool on a separate line
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the String version of the workshop

      • findTool

        public Tool findTool(Tool thing)
        findTool returns a reference to the Tool from the workshop that matches the name of the parameter item
        Parameters:
        thing - the Tool to find (based on name)
        Returns:
        the found Tool or null if not found

      • updateUses

        public boolean updateUses(Tool thing,
                 int add)
        updateUses increments the number of uses of a tool
        Parameters:
        thing - the tool to find (based on name)
        add - the number of uses to add
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether or not the tool exists in the workshop

      • updatePrice

        public boolean updatePrice(Tool thing,
                  double a)
        updatePrice assigns a new price for the tool
        Parameters:
        thing - the tool to find (based on name)
        a - the new price to assign
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether or not the tool exists in the workshop

      • sortByUses

        public static void sortByUses(java.util.ArrayList<Tool> list)
        sortByUses sorts the workshop by number of uses, going from most to least
        Parameters:
        list - the arraylist of tools to sort

      • sortByDate

        public static void sortByDate(java.util.ArrayList<Tool> list)
        sortByDate sorts the workshop by the most recent use
        Parameters:
        list - the arraylist of tools to sort

      • getTotalPrice

        public double getTotalPrice()
        getTotalPrice returns the total Price of all Tools in the workshop
        Returns:
        the price of all Tools.

      • removeTool

        public boolean removeTool(Tool thing)
        removeTool removes a specified Tool from the workshop if it exists, and returns true. If the Tool does not exist in the workshop, returns false.
        Parameters:
        thing - the tool to search for and remove
        Returns:
        whether the item was removed

      • saveToFile

        public void saveToFile()
        Saves the current contents of the workshop to a user specified file.

      • loadFromFile

        public void loadFromFile()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a new workshop from a user specified file. Uses JFileChooser to allow the user to browse for the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
